query:
-- Jan Kowalski (UoP) - stawka 60 zł/h × 168h = 10,080 zł rocznie = 840 zł miesięcznie
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 84000, 
    vacationCostAnnual = 1008000
WHERE firstName = 'Jan' AND lastName = 'Kowalski' AND employmentType = 'uop';

-- Anna Nowak (B2B) - stawka 80 zł/h × 168h = 13,440 zł rocznie = 1,120 zł miesięcznie
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 112000,
    vacationCostAnnual = 1344000
WHERE firstName = 'Anna' AND lastName = 'Nowak' AND employmentType = 'b2b';

-- Piotr Wiśniewski (UoP) - stawka 50 zł/h × 168h = 8,400 zł rocznie = 700 zł miesięcznie
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 70000,
    vacationCostAnnual = 840000
WHERE firstName = 'Piotr' AND lastName = 'Wiśniewski' AND employmentType = 'uop';

-- Maria Lewandowska (Zlecenie) - stawka 45 zł/h × 168h = 7,560 zł rocznie = 630 zł miesięcznie
UPDATE employees 
SET vacationCostMonthly = 63000,
    vacationCostAnnual = 756000
WHERE firstName = 'Maria' AND lastName = 'Lewandowska' AND employmentType = 'zlecenie';
